verses.name: Numbers 31:19
verses.text: And do ye abide without the camp seven days: whosoever hath killed any person, and whosoever hath touched any slain, purify both yourselves and your captives on the third day, and on the seventh day.

verses.name: Numbers 31:20
verses.text: And purify all your raiment, and all that is made of skins, and all work of goats’ hair, and all things made of wood.

verses.name: Numbers 31:21
verses.text: And Eleazar the priest said unto the men of war which went to the battle, This is the ordinance of the law which the Lord commanded Moses;
